ReportItem.pluginName: Terminal Services Encryption Level is not FIPS-140 Compliant
ReportItem.description: The encryption setting used by the remote Terminal Services service is not FIPS-140 compliant.
ReportItem.plugin_name: Terminal Services Encryption Level is not FIPS-140 Compliant
ReportItem.solution:
Change RDP encryption level to :
4. FIPS Compliant
ReportItem.synopsis: The remote host is not FIPS-140 compliant.
ReportItem.plugin_output:
The terminal services encryption level is set to :
2. Medium (Client Compatible)

ReportItem.pluginName: Terminal Services Encryption Level is Medium or Low
ReportItem.description:
The remote Terminal Services service is not configured to use strong cryptography.
Using weak cryptography with this service may allow an attacker to eavesdrop on the communications more easily and obtain screenshots and/or keystrokes.
ReportItem.plugin_name: Terminal Services Encryption Level is Medium or Low
ReportItem.solution:
Change RDP encryption level to one of :
3. High
4. FIPS Compliant
ReportItem.synopsis: The remote host is using weak cryptography.
ReportItem.plugin_output:
The terminal services encryption level is set to :
2. Medium
